description: A type is a reusable element that can be connected with other types over ports.

variant.description: The optional variant of the type. No variant means the default variant.

items.description: A port is a connection point (with a direction) of a type.
A locator is meta-data for grouping ports.

subgroup.description: The optional sub-group of the locator. No sub-group means true.

items.description: A attribute is a key value pair with an an optional definition.

value.description: The optional value [ text | url ] of the attribute. No value is equivalent to true.

unit.description: The optional unit of the value of the attribute.
